alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Seminole, central Lake and western Orange Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1244 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lisbon to near Howey-In-the-hills to Winter Garden to near Bay Lake. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Apopka, Altamonte Springs, Ocoee, Winter Garden, Winter Park, Eustis, Maitland, Tavares, Mount Dora, Windermere, Howey-In-the-hills, Bay Lake, Oak Ridge, Lisbon, Mount Plymouth, College Park, Zellwood, Emeralda and Lake Apopka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
